Below is a copy of the g-r color index data (n = 2107) used in the paper "Topological mixture estimation."

To retrieve this data directly from VizieR, take the following steps:
*	Open http://cdsarc.u-strasbg.fr/viz-bin/Cat?J/ApJ/700/523#sRM3.1
*	Click on the "VizieR" tab
*	Uncheck all "Show" boxes except for the g-r column*	
*	Under "Preferences" on the left hand side, set "max" to "unlimited"
*	Just below the "max" selector, set the format as desired (default is "HTML Table")
*	On the right hand side, click the "Submit" tab
